languages.text: Из пластали выкован каркас Империума. Строения, оборудование, техника, броня — все это требует пластали.

traits.locale_text: Из пластали выкован каркас Империума. Строения, оборудование, техника, броня — все это требует в производство пласталь.

languages.text: The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.
languages.original_text: Из пластали выкован каркас Империума. Строения, оборудование, техника, броня — все это требует пластали.

traits.locale_text: Plasteel binds the Imperium together. Buildings, machines, armor and weapons — almost every industry requires it.
Plasteel binds the Imperium together. Buildings, machines, armor and weapons — almost every industry requires it.
The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — almost every industry requires plasteel.
The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — almost every industry requires plasteel.
The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.
The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.

languages.text: 帝国绝大部分制品的框架都是由塑钢制成的。无论是建筑物、机器、盔甲还是武器，制造这些东西都需要用到塑钢。
languages.original_text: The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.

traits.locale_text: 帝国绝大部分制品的框架都是由塑钢制成的。无论是建筑物、机器、盔甲还是武器，制造这些东西都需要用到塑钢。

languages.text: El armazón del Imperium se forjó en plastiacero. Edificios, máquinas, blindaje, armas: todo requiere su uso.
languages.original_text: The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.

traits.locale_text: El armazón del Imperium se forjó en plastiacero. Edificios, máquinas, blindaje, armas: todo requiere su uso.

languages.text: 帝国の骨格はプラスチールで鍛えられた。建物、機械、アーマー、武器、これらはすべてプラスチールを必要とする。
languages.original_text: The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の骨格はプラスティールで鍛えられた。建物、機械、アーマー、武器、これらはすべてプラスティールを必要とする。

languages.text: Das Fundament des Imperiums wurde aus Plaststahl errichtet. Gebäude, Maschinen, Panzerung und Waffen — für alles wird Plaststahl benötigt.
languages.original_text: The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.

traits.locale_text: Das Fundament des Imperiums wurde aus Plaststahl errichtet. Gebäude, Maschinen, Panzerung und Waffen — für alles wird Plaststahl benötigt.

languages.text: Les fondations de l'Imperium ont été forgées dans le plastacier. Bâtiments, machines, blindages et armes... Tout est composé de plastacier.
languages.original_text: The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.

traits.locale_text: Les fondations de l'Imperium ont été forgées dans le plastacier. Bâtiments, machines, blindages et armes... Tout est composé de plastacier.

languages.text: İmparatorluk'un temelleri, plasçelikten dövülmüştür. Binalar, makineler, zırhlar ve silahlar. Hepsi için plasçelik gerekir.
languages.original_text: The framework of the Imperium was forged in plasteel. Buildings, machines, armour, and weapons — they all require plasteel.
